mapper.insert: insert into sku_info (sku_id, price, sku_name, sku_desc, store, salcount, img, create_time) values (#{sku_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sku_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP});
